About Our Charleston Event Venue

One Broad, the second-floor private venue at Brasserie la Banque boasts expansive views of Charleston's historic South of Broad neighborhood, and offers an elegant setting for intimate dinners and special events.

With three unique private event settings, Brasserie La Banque has a space for every occasion. Let Brasserie La Banque help you celebrate life's memorable moments from business happy hours, showers, celebratory dinners, weddings and more. The Brasserie features a selection of traditional French dishes alongside more innovated fare. Please fill out the information below and one of our team members will contact you with information to help reserve our private room for your event. Or email us directly at .
labanque@theindigoroad.com 
For more information and capacities, click an image below.

[Page Title: Bar Vauté | Brasserie La Banque in Charleston, SC]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 7 Slide 2 of 7 Slide 3 of 7 Slide 4 of 7 Slide 5 of 7 Slide 6 of 7 Slide 7 of 7 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
A "bar clandestin" hidden in plain sight

Located beneath French restaurant Brasserie la Banque, Bar Vauté is a destination of its own for after-hours imbibing and enjoyment. The space moonlights as a secluded cocktail bar and evening eatery. When guests descend the building's original historic staircase, they're transported back in time, accentuated by the room's soft lighting, Art Deco influenced furnishings, and intimate bar. One of the only below-street-level bars in the city, Bar Vauté invites locals and visitors alike to indulge in a crepe, cocktail, and a glass, or two, of champagne.

Follow Bar Vauté on Instagram
Instagram 
FORBES
"Where You Should Go In Charleston Now"

About Our Charleston Event Venue

One Broad, the second-floor private venue at Brasserie la Banque boasts expansive views of Charleston's historic South of Broad neighborhood, and offers an elegant setting for intimate dinners and special events.

With three unique private event settings, Brasserie La Banque has a space for every occasion. Let Brasserie La Banque help you celebrate life's memorable moments from business happy hours, showers, celebratory dinners, weddings and more. The Brasserie features a selection of traditional French dishes alongside more innovated fare. Please fill out the information below and one of our team members will contact you with information to help reserve our private room for your event. Or email us directly at .
